title: Weaver's Thesis Book, "Theorie de la fabrication des etoffes de soie enseignée par Fçois Bert. Lyon.", mid- 19th century
inscribed: Inscribed by Théodore Bon, a former owner of book. "Ce livre provient de la bibliothèque de H. Rouze, ancien dessinateur et fabricant de soieries à Lyon. Il a été fait dan la classe de M. Bert, ancien professeur de théorie de tissapeà Lyon, vers 1840 on 1850."
description: Handwritten instructions are arranged one per page with mise-en-carte and sample pasted in a book with 258 pages. Book ends with fifteen pages of illustrations showing arrangements of cards on a Jacquard loom for different weaves.

tombstone.epitaph: Weaver's Thesis Book, "Theorie de la fabrication des etoffes de soie enseignée par Fçois Bert. Lyon.", mid- 19th century. Medium: paper, leather, silk, wool. 1958-24-2.
